info.name: Stretch
info.description:
Oldschool stretcher used by Silents in "Optic Nerve" in 1993.

Originally coded in asm on the cpu. It's a simple 2D interpolation of the source bmp so it was fast enough to run 60fps on an average 486 machine.

Optic Nerve: https://youtu.be/BalqUrhDKZc

renderpass.name: Image
